<JD_START>
Job Title: Upscale Marriott resort seeking hotline cook!

Location: Point Clear, AL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Detailed description

Join this historic Marriott Autograph Collection property to gain valuable culinary experience, you will rotate between Banquet Demi Chef, Restaurant Demi Chef, and Chef de Partie. Seize this chance in a fantastic location and revel in the beauty of Alabama and the Florida Panhandle's beaches and coastlines during your downtime!

Placement Remarks

Salary:

Demi Chef: $14.00 per hour

Chef de Partie: 17.00 per hour

Benefits include uniforms, discounted room nights at most Marriott hotels, and discounts in all corporate Marriott gift shops and restaurants.

After 6 hours of work the employee needs to take a 30 minute meal break (unpaid). If they want to purchase a meal from the employee cafeteria it will cost $3.50

Salary

Salary:

Demi Chef: $14.00 per hour

Chef de Partie: 17.00 per hour

Requirements

Culinary degree plus current culinary experience

Must have prior 6 months experience or more (more the better)

Previous hot line experience!

Local attractions

Point Clear, Alabama is a small coastal town right outside of Fair Hope on the Gulf Coast. Located right on the water, Point Clear offers a beautiful escape from bigger cities with some of the most beautiful sunsets in the state. On your days off head across the bay to explore Mobile or enjoy one of the many outdoor activities in the area.

Housing:

Grand Hotel offers employee housing at a subsidized rate of $102.50 per week which can be auto deducted from the associateâ€™s paycheck. The rent includes all utilities (electricity, water, sewer, trash) plus basic cable and phone. J1 Residents can set up their own Internet service through Mediacom. Rent also includes transportation to/from the hotel along with potential transportation. The units are dormitory style with 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with no more than 8 occupants of the same gender per unit (2 per bedroom). Kitchen, laundry room, living/dining room are shared areas. There would be a $200 deposit, taken out in increments of $50 for the first 4 paychecks along with normal weekly rent of $102.50. Up to $100 of the deposit is refundable upon vacating the unit provided the occupant complied with the terms of the lease agreement. Employee housing is double occupancy rooms for same gender candidates. Housing rate subject to change in 2022 to reflect market increase.

Transportation:

Transportation from housing to the hotel is provided within the cost of housing.

If travel outside of the area is desired you will need to find your own transportation. For this a rideshare can be used but the purchase of a vehicle may be necessary. Please keep in mind insurance will be required if purchasing a vehicle. You can expect to pay approximately $150 per month for insurance. HRC recommends you bring at lest $2,500 if purchasing a vehicle.

Climate: See here for climate and weather info.

Local Attractions: Historic Mobile, Naval Aviation Museum, USS Alabama, Fairhope Film Festival, Dauphin Island, Fort Morgan.

Details

Grand Hotel Golf Resort & Spa

Point Clear, AL

June 10, 2024

Chef - Commis Chef - Chef de Partie

14.00 per Hour

Once you click the apply button, one of our wonderful career consultants will be notified of your interest in this position and will get back to you within two business days. When you qualify for the placement, the next step will be an introductory call to see if we can meet your expectations.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
